+-------------------+      +-------------------+      +-------------------+
|                   |      |                   |      |                   |
|   Markdown Files  +----->+   DocFX Build    +----->+   HTML Website    |
|                   |      |                   |      |                   |
+-------------------+      +-------------------+      +-------------------+
        ^                          |
        |                          |
        |                          v
+-------------------+      +-------------------+
|                   |      |                   |
|   Code Comments   |      |    API Docs       |
|                   |      |                   |
+-------------------+      +-------------------+
```

*Figure 1: DocFX Documentation Generation Workflow*
